overview: A baby, John, who was abandoned in the church with a horse-headed koto on his side. His grandfather was once a Morin Khuur player and died in the atomic bombing of Nagasaki. The brilliantly colored images have an avant-garde charm while hiding the sadness of the war, and will grab the viewer's heart.
tagline: The roundness of the top and bottom is the roundness of reincarnation.
title: Matouqin Nocturne
